roleset.name: suffer, endure/undergo something painful

example.name: intransitive
example.text: The company's return on equity could suffer if it made a higher bid.
example.arg: if it made a higher bid

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: From the very beginning the teacher only spoke English and her son suffered a lot of setbacks .

example.name: with S-malady
example.text: Thou shalt not suffer a fool to live.

roleset.note:
SUFFER-V NOTES: I doubt this latter syntax will come up in WSJ, but you never know. (from suffer.01-v)
SUFFERING-N NOTES: suffer.01 (from suffering.01-n)
